participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Supportive and ambitious, always striving for self-improvement.
participant_1.background: My favorite people are the ones who support me and encourage me to be the best version of myself. I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions. I run marathons. I hope I can use my martial arts skills to protect myself and others. I have three beautiful dogs and one cat.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and driven, with a passion for storytelling through animation.
participant_2.background: My family and I have different goals, but we get along well. I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court. I have a girlfriend named Luis, and she goes to my college. I work in TV. Someday I wish to become a famous animator and work for a big company like Dreamworks.

content.text: I am interested in finding a new place to live. What is your favorite thing about your home?
My house is close to a basketball court. I play basketball almost every day.
What do you do for work?
I work in TV. I am an animator. I hope to one day work for a big company like Dreamworks.
That sounds like a really fun job. I am a tutor. I would love to have a home big enough to host my tutoring sessions.
That is a great job. I think it is very important to help people learn.
I agree. It is very rewarding. What are your goals?
I want to become a famous animator and work for a big company like Dreamworks.
That is a great goal. I am sure you will achieve it. What is your favorite thing to do with your girlfriend?
We love to go to the movies and play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I am single right now. I am looking for someone who is supportive and encouraging.
I am sure you will find someone great. You seem like a really nice person.
Thank you. I think you are great too.
